title: Powers & Abilities
description: Test your knowledge of supernatural powers!

questions.question: What makes Hope Mikaelson unique among supernatural beings?
questions.explanation: Hope is the first tribrid, possessing witch powers, the werewolf gene, and vampire blood from birth.

questions.question: What is Marcel's upgraded vampire form called?
questions.explanation: Marcel becomes 'The Beast' after taking the serum, making him stronger than the Originals with a lethal bite.

questions.question: Klaus's blood can cure a werewolf bite.
questions.explanation: As the Original Hybrid, Klaus's blood is the only cure for the fatal werewolf bite that kills vampires.

questions.question: What special ability does Freya possess as a firstborn Mikaelson witch?
questions.explanation: Firstborn Mikaelson witches possess immense power, which is why Dahlia sought to take Freya and later Hope.

questions.question: What can the Papa Tunde blade do?

options.text: Cause endless torment and immobilize vampires

questions.explanation: The blade channels dark magic to cause excruciating pain and can immobilize even Original vampires.

questions.question: Hybrids can transform into wolves at will without pain.
questions.explanation: Unlike regular werewolves who painfully transform on full moons, hybrids can shift at will painlessly.

questions.question: What ancient evil is known as 'The Hollow'?

options.text: An ancient powerful spirit seeking resurrection

questions.explanation: The Hollow is the spirit of Inadu, an ancient and extremely powerful witch seeking to return to life.

questions.question: What happens when an Original is stabbed with a silver dagger dipped in white oak ash?
questions.explanation: The daggers neutralize Originals, putting them in a death-like state until the dagger is removed.
